introText: Melina Taj was established in 1401 with the aim of providing beauty services and products. Providing high-quality cosmetic products, holding specialized make-up courses are among the most important goals of Melina Taj until today.
introCourse: The purpose of the course is that the student can learn all the tips and techniques of professional makeup online and be able to do it in a practical and professional way.
introShop: All cosmetic products must be of high quality, because being fake or of bad quality causes a lot of damage to the skin and hair. Melina Taj store has prepared the best and highest quality products for you and you can buy them very easily according to your needs.
contactUsText: Mel cosmetic and skin support team will respond to you via WhatsApp, email and phone calls every day from 10:00 am to 6:00 pm in order to improve the quality of answering questions and solving possible problems.
productDes: The style of makeup is changing every day and the tools used to use it have also changed. Makeup pads are one of the tools and accessories of cosmetics that will be used to spread makeup evenly on the face. This makeup pad is for spreading Cosmetics are applied to the face. Achieving a flawless finish on any foundation, foundation, or even cream blush is possible with this curved sponge.

courseText: This course is for beginners to advanced people, and in it, all the special tips for makeup such as eye makeup, skin makeup, contouring, skin knowledge, foundation, eyelashes, lip makeup, etc. are taught. The purpose of the course is to The student can learn all the tips and techniques of professional makeup online and can start working professionally. The duration of each session is between 40 minutes and 1 hour and a half.
courseContent: This course consists of 12 sessions in which 10 bridal makeup models with different styles are included. This course is for beginners to advanced people and includes all the tips for makeup such as eye makeup, skin makeup, contouring Knowledge of skin, foundation, eyelashes, lip makeup, etc. are taught.
joinUsText: With your membership in the Melina Taj newsletter, you can find out about all the courses and products available on the site. Enter your contact number and become a member of the Melina Taj newsletter.

AbuotUs: I created Mel C&S in 1401 with the aim to be able to produce products that are in my dreams and make them come true as someone who loves the world of make-up and beauty. This is not my only brand and I would like you to know that Each and every one of you were by my side in the process of designing and producing these products and encouraged me to make this dream come true.
AbuotUs_2: You may not know, but your ideas are in all our products!All our products will be without animal testing.And one of my most valuable goals for this brand is that our products are of great quality so that all of you can use them happily. This is just the beginning...Thank you for your unwavering support
